title: Can't download League, want some help
body:
Hi,
I was recently trying to install league to my account, and came across an issue.
I got the following messages:

Failed to Launch file C:\Users\Name\AppData\Roaming\Riot Games\League of Legends\prerequisites\vcredist_x86.exe Error: 0

And:

Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable (x86) mandatory prerequisite was not correctly installed
After these messages, the Installer tells me the game did not install, and I should try it later.

I have tried this many times, and it has not worked.
Does anyone know what I could do to install League?
Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try manually installing the [Visual C++ 2005 Redist package (x86)](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=5638) and then attempt to install the game, let me know if this helps.
Worked like a charm, cheers mate
